Title: Tunnel Trouble
Description:
It's good to have new allies here. Together, we have much better chances of protecting this tower.

The nerubians have overwhelmed us. If we're going to have any chance against them, we need to destroy the burrows they're using to come under the Wall.

If you can handle that, we will survey the field from the top of the wall and meet you there.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Great Kyron atop the Aegis Wall.
RewardText: Excellent, $n--if we don't have to worry about the nerubians stabbing us in the back, we can deal with those pouring through below.
